reviewText: wonderful series, lots of lovely memories from my childhood
My 5 year old grandaughter has been riding horses for two years now. She had no interest in the DVDs . Maybe when she's older?

This one surprised me, I have 11 grandchildren I got this for when they visited. I found my self enjoying it as well. I have watched a ,ot of movies, tv shows, and this one I never seen. verygood and price is very great. Scenery? wow.......
Our daughter is horse crazy & she 100% loves these. She loves Black Beauty & will sit & play with her ponies watching this & she will watch an episode eating lunch.
well worth every penny that i paid for it.will watch it over and over again. VERY GOOD FOR ALL THE FAMILY.
